Text:
Very good for kids to learn the importance of tolerance.
How sad that most of the animations from nowadays can't be shown to small kids because they are full of rudeness, selfishness and aggressiveness.   

http://www.gifninja.com/Workspace/0b75f0ab-8e73-433d-bd3e-440141cdb551/output.gif
Just had to download this. I was given the original album in 1971 at ten years old. It still comes to mind every now and again. Great movie for kids! Cheers to the uploader !
